headline: Prominence Health's $100 Million Medicare Savings Might Change The Case For Investing In UHS
summary: In October 2025, Universal Health Services announced that its subsidiary, Prominence Health, and partner clinicians generated over US$100 million in Medicare savings for 2024, adding to more than US$600 million in cumulative value since 2014 through their value-based care programs. Universal Health Services’ emphasis on physician-led Accountable Care Organizations resulted in high state rankings for both cost savings and quality scores, highlighting the growing impact of integrated primary...

headline: Universal Health Services (UHS): Evaluating Valuation as Analyst Coverage and Medicare Savings Spotlight Behavioral Health Momentum
summary: Goldman Sachs has just begun covering Universal Health Services, reflecting both changing views on the behavioral health sector and expectations for steady, modest growth in inpatient psychiatric services. At the same time, Prominence Health, a subsidiary of Universal Health Services, reported over $100 million in Medicare savings for 2024. This milestone highlights the company’s ongoing focus on value-based care initiatives. See our latest analysis for Universal Health Services. Shares of...
